name: Pinball Vs: The return of Reckoning 2
name_original: Pinball Vs: The return of Reckoning 2
description:
The player's goal is to not let the ball fall into their pit and try to score into the opponents pit. A goofy fun two player pinball game.

Controls: A,S,D for Player 1 and J,K,L for Player 2
